property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Ranger. Warrior.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Each enemy engaged with you gets -1 Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Aragorn participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, choose an enemy not engaged with you and engage that enemy.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While you are engaged with an enemy, Halbarad does not exhaust to commit to a quest.
You may optionally engage 1 additional enemy during the encounter phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Weather Hills Watchman enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Signal card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Dúnedain Hunter enters play, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a non-unique enemy and put it into play engaged with you. If no enemy enters play by this effect, discard Dúnedain Hunter. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Sarn Ford Sentry enters play, draw 1 card for each enemy engaged with you.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Warden of Annúminas gets +1 Ò for each enemy engaged with you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control a Dúnedain hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Planning Action: Shuffle 1 of your set aside Ranger of the North allies with the encounter keyword into the encounter deck. Then, remove Ranger Summons from the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only before the resolving enemy attacks step.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Choose an enemy not engaged with you. Engage that enemy. Then, discard a shadow card from that enemy, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you engage an enemy, exhaust a Scout or Ranger character to place X progress tokens on a location. X is the engaged enemy’s printed $.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Dúnedain hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Planning Action: Exhaust Heir of Valandil to reduce the cost of the next Dúnedain ally you play this phase by 1 for each enemy engaged with you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Dúnedain or Healer hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard Athelas and exhaust attached character to heal all damage on a character. You may discard a Condition attachment from that character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to an enemy. Limit 1 per enemy. Attached enemy gets -1 $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When attached enemy is destroyed, reduce each player’s threat by the attached enemy’s printed $.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Dúnedain or Noldor hero. Limit 1 per hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are engaged with an enemy, attached hero gets +1 Ò and cannot have its Ò reduced.

property.name: Type
property.value: Side Quest

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Limit 1 per deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After this stage is defeated, each player may search his deck for 1 card and add it to his hand. Each player shuffles his deck.

property.value: Dúnedain. Ranger.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Encounter. Surge. Ranged. Sentinel.

property.name: Text

property.value: Dark Sorcery

property.name: Text
property.value:
Cards in each player’s discard pile cannot leave that player’s discard pile by player card effect.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Intruders in Chetwood

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Put Iârion into play. Add 1 Orc War Party to the staging area. Each player adds 1 different location to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Intruders in Chetwood

property.name: Text
property.value:
Enemies do not make engagement checks.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, raise each player's threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.
If the players control Iarion and defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Weather Hills

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Orc Ambush and Amon Ford aside, out of play. Create the Orc deck (see insert) and set it next to the quest deck. Make Exposed Ridge the active location. Add Hunting the Orcs and 1 Weathered Hilltop to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Weather Hills

property.name: Text
property.value:
The first Weather treachery revealed each round gains surge.
Forced: After the active location is explored, reveal the top card of the Orc deck and resolve its staging as if it was just revealed from the encounter deck (the top 2 cards instead if there are 3 or more players in the game).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Weather Hills

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: End the current phase. Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the Orc deck into the encounter deck. Reveal Orc Ambush and Amon Ford and add them to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Weather Hills

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each damaged character gets -1 Ò.
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, either discard 1 resource token from Savage Counter-attack, or reveal an additional encounter card this phase.
If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Weather Hills

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 resource token here. Then if there are at least X resource tokens here, flip Hunting the Orcs and place each resource token here on Savage Counterattack. After that, advance to stage 2. X is 3 more than the number of players in the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Weather Hills

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After Savage Counter-attack enters play, advance to stage 2A.
Forced: After an enemy attacks and destroys a character, discard 1 resource token here.
If there are no resource tokens here, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Deadmen's Dike

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Put Iârion into play. Set Thaurdir aside, out of play. Add 1 copy of Fornost Square to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Deadmen's Dike

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Each player musst search the encounter deck for a Baleful Shade and put it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck and reveal 1 encounter card per player.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, each player discards the top card of his deck.
If a player has no cards in his deck, he is eliminated from the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Deadmen's Dike

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Thaurdir to the staging area. Then, reveal 1 encounter card per player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Deadmen's Dike

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After Thaurdir attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller must either discard the top 3 cards of his deck, or return Thaurdir to the staging area.
If a player has no cards in his deck, he is eliminated from the game. The players cannot defeat this stage while Thaurdir has any hit points remaining. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.
